appetizers.name: Truffle Risotto Arancini
appetizers.description: Creamy truffle risotto balls, fried to a golden crisp, served with a saffron aioli.

appetizers.name: Seared Scallops
appetizers.description: Pan-seared jumbo scallops with a cauliflower pur√©e and brown butter vinaigrette.

appetizers.name: Burrata Caprese
appetizers.description: Fresh burrata, heirloom tomatoes, basil pesto, and a balsamic glaze.

main_courses.name: Wagyu Beef Tenderloin
main_courses.description: 8oz premium wagyu beef, potato gratin, asparagus, and a red wine reduction.

main_courses.name: Duck Confit
main_courses.description: Slow-cooked duck leg with a cherry sauce, served over a bed of wild rice.

main_courses.name: Pan-Seared Salmon
main_courses.description: Crispy skin salmon with a lemon-dill sauce, quinoa, and seasonal vegetables.

main_courses.name: Lobster Ravioli
main_courses.description: Handmade ravioli filled with lobster meat, in a light tomato cream sauce.

desserts.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
desserts.description: Decadent molten chocolate cake with a raspberry coulis and vanilla bean ice cream.

desserts.name: Deconstructed Tiramisu
desserts.description: A modern take on the classic, with mascarpone foam, coffee-soaked ladyfingers, and cocoa dust.

desserts.name: Artisanal Cheese Platter
desserts.description: A selection of three artisanal cheeses, with fig jam, nuts, and toasted baguette.
